title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 4117/87 of 21 December 1987 fixing the standard values to be used in calculating the financial compensation and the advance pertaining thereto in respect of fishery products withdrawn from the market during the 1988 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 4117/87
of 21 December 1987
fixing the standard values to be used in calculating the financial compensation and the advance pertaining thereto in respect of fishery products withdrawn from the market during the 1988 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The standard values to be used in calculating the financial compensation and the advance pertaining thereto provided for in Article 13 of Regulation (EEC) No 3796/81 in respect of products withdrawn by producers' organizations and used for purposes other than human consumption shall be for the 1988 fishing year as shown in the Annex hereto for each of the uses indicated therein.
The standard value to be deducted from the financial compensation and the advance pertaining thereto shall be that applied in the Member State in which the producers' organization was recognized.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
